description: Classic cargo shorts, designed to keep you warm on the water. Neoprene lining ups the heat, which comes in handy when you're tackling open water on an SUP or in a kayak.Blend of nylon and spandex is soft on skin.Stretchy 0.5mm neoprene lining.Zipper fly with snap closure.11in. inseam for good coverage.Piping detail for a clean look.
name: Level Six Pro Guide Neoprene Lined Boardshorts - Men's
